item.description:
I can not be here, but Christi will be! The Chilean music is usually wonderful!
Kelly
--
Chilean Peña
Saturday, May 1st, 2010, 6:00 p.m.
At Café “La Paloma Sabanera”
405 Capitol Avenue, Hartford, Connecticut

Andean and Latin American Music, Poetry, Dance, Door Prizes
Songs of Violeta Parra, Víctor Jara, Mercedes Sosa, Eduardo Gatti, Dankel Viglietti, and other Chilean and South American composers
Artists:
“Los Criollos del Loa,” “Los Lolos,” and other singers
Donation: $10.00 dollars
This a benefit for the victims of the earthquake and tsunami that affected regions in the south of Chile
Proceeds will donated to the American Red Cross/Chile International Relief
Sponsored by the Chilean Solidarity Committee and
the State of Connecticut/Latino and Puerto Rican Commission
For more information call (860) 371-4439, martaluztorres@hotmail.com,
jbritoeditor@aol.com
item.name: Chilean Peña
